casebody.data:
First Department,

December, 1981

(December 1, 1981) In the Matter of the Estate of Jane M. Renard, Deceased. Arthur H. Dean et al., Respondents; Philip J. Renard, Appellant.

Order, Surrogate’s Court, New York County (Midonick, S.), entered on April 17, 1981, unanimously affirmed, without costs and without disbursements and without prejudice to an application to the Surrogate’s Court, New York County, for an award of counsel fees. No opinion. Concur — Murphy, P. J., Sandler, Sullivan, Ross and Lynch, JJ.
